Aurora.name: Aurora
Aurora.title: the Witch Between Worlds
Aurora.lore: From the moment she was born, Aurora navigated life with a unique ability to move between the spirit and material realms. Determined to learn more about the spirit realm's inhabitants, she left her home to further her research and happened upon a wayward demigod who'd become twisted and lost to time. Witnessing his desperation, Aurora resolved to find a way to help her feral friend regain his forgotten identityâ€”a journey that would take her to the farthest reaches of the Freljord.
Aurora.blurb: From the moment she was born, Aurora navigated life with a unique ability to move between the spirit and material realms. Determined to learn more about the spirit realm's inhabitants, she left her home to further her research and happened upon a...

spells.name: Twofold Hex
spells.description: Aurora sends out a missile that curses any enemies it hits. She can then recast the ability to draw active curses back toward herself, damaging foes who are hit along the way.
spells.tooltip:
Fire cursed energy in a direction, dealing {{ damage }} magic damage to enemies and cursing them for {{ markduration }} seconds.

Recast: End the curse, drawing back part of the enemy's spirit to Aurora, dealing up to {{ q2damagemax }} magic damage to enemies passed through based on their missing health. Damage beyond the first hit is reduced to 20%.{{ spellmodifierdescriptionappend }}

spells.name: Across the Veil
spells.description: Aurora leaps in a direction of her choosing, entering the spirit realm upon landing and becoming invisible for a short duration of time.
spells.tooltip:
Hop in a direction. Upon landing, enter the spirit realm, becoming Invisible for {{ invisduration }} seconds and entering Realm Hopper.

Scoring a takedown on an enemy champion resets this Ability's Cooldown.{{ spellmodifierdescriptionappend }}

spells.name: The Weirding
spells.description: Aurora converges the realms, sending out a blast of spirit magic that damages and slows enemies before Aurora hops backward to safety.
spells.tooltip:
Converge the realms, sending out a blast of spirit magic dealing {{ damagecalc }} magic damage to enemies in the area and Slowing them by {{ slowpercent*-100 }}% decaying over {{ slowduration }} second.

Aurora hops backwards a short distance after casting.
{{ spellmodifierdescriptionappend }}

spells.name: Between Worlds
spells.description: Aurora leaps in a direction of her choosing, releasing a shockwave that damages and slows any enemies it hits. Afterward, she creates an area that traps enemies within it and allows Aurora to teleport from one side of the area to the other.
spells.tooltip:
Leap in a direction. Upon landing, Aurora converges the realms, sending out a pulse of spirit energy that deals {{ damagecalc }} magic damage and Slows enemies hit by {{ slowpercent*-100 }}% for 2 seconds.

The area of convergence stays active for {{ areaduration }} seconds, empowering Aurora's Realm Hopper and allowing her to jump from one edge of the area to another.

Enemies attempting to enter or leave the area are Slowed by {{ exitslowpercent*-100 }}% for {{ stunduration }} seconds after being pushed back toward the center.

Aurora can Recast this Ability to end the effect early.{{ spellmodifierdescriptionappend }}

passive.name: Spirit Abjuration
passive.description: Aurora's spells and attacks exorcise spirits from the enemies she damages. Exorcised spirits follow Aurora around, healing her and granting her bonus movement speed.
